title: Queue Processing Stalled (No Dequeues)
description: This monitor detects when n8n queue processing has stalled with no jobs being dequeued. This critical condition indicates workers may be crashed, blocked, or disconnected from the queue.

definition.name: [n8n] Queue Processing Stalled (No Dequeues)
definition.message: {{#is_alert}}No jobs dequeued on {{host.name}} in last 10 minutes. Workers may be crashed, blocked, or disconnected.{{/is_alert}}{{#is_warning}}Very few jobs processed on {{host.name}}.{{/is_warning}}{{#is_recovery}}Job processing resumed on {{host.name}}.{{/is_recovery}}

options.escalation_message: Queue processing still stalled. Immediate intervention required.
